snippet: The unwillingness of House Republicans to work for the common good suggests that the 113th Congress will be bitterly unproductive.
abstract: Editorial contends Republican intransigence on fiscal deal suggests that 113th Congress will be bitterly unproductive; warns Pres Obama that standing up to House Republican brinkmanship on budget will require level of resolve that he has yet to demonstrate.
lead_paragraph: The unwillingness of House Republicans to work for the common good suggests that the 113th Congress will be bitterly unproductive.

headline.seo: Dereliction of Duty: More Fiscal Battles Ahead
headline.print_headline: The fiscal battles ahead are likely to be even harder
